EmailTemplate.name: 2016 EMEAI HUMS Eblast D&S.2016 EMEAI HUMS Eblast D&S
EmailTemplate.subject: WHY HUMS?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: LET OUR CUSTOMER TELL YOU ABOUT HUMS! HUMS COULD KEEP YOU FLYING LONGER Honeywell's Health and Usage Monitoring System (HUMS) uses sensors and embedded diagnostic software to monitor and communicate the health and maintenance needs of critical components in your helicopter. Increasing aircraft availability Reducing maintenance costs Optimizing parts inventory management Enhancing safety Don't just take our word for it, let our customer tell you! <[[https://youtu.be/sW3QxclOgWc]]> WATCH HERE <[[http://hwll.co/p53e]]> © 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://m.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> Sign up for the Helicopter Newsletter here. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/newsletter]]> Learn more about HUMS. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/product-listing/health-and-usage-monitoring#panel-2]]> Terms of Use <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> | Privacy Policy <[[http://www.honeywell.com/privacy-statement]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us]]>
